// SV_Position              0   xyzw        3      POS   float   xyzw

vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[13], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyzw
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xy
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_output o1.xyz
dcl_output o2.xy
dcl_output_siv o3.xyzw, position
dcl_temps 3

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov o0.xyzw, v1.zyxw
dp4 r0.x, v0.xyzw, cb0[9].xyzw
dp4 r0.y, v0.xyzw, cb0[10].xyzw
dp4 r1.w, v0.xyzw, cb0[12].xyzw
mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), -r1.wwww
mul r1.xy, r0.xyxx, l(1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
dp4 r1.z, v0.xyzw, cb0[11].xyzw

// Relocated to here with asmtool.py
mov o3.xyzw, r1.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 720bcc7de9e910ae-vs.txt
ne r2.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r2.w
  add r2.w, r1.w, -r2.y
  mad r1.x, r2.w, r2.x, r1.x
endif

dp4 o1.x, r1.xyzw, cb0[5].xyzw
dp4 o1.y, r1.xyzw, cb0[6].xyzw
dp4 o1.z, r1.xyzw, cb0[8].xyzw

// mov o3.xyzw, r1.xyzw // Relocated from here with asmtool.py

mov o2.xy, v2.xyxx
ret 
// Approximately 13 instruction slots used
